problem_text: In rhombus L M P Q, m \angle Q L M = 2 x^ { 2 } - 10, m \angle Q P M = 8 x, and M P = 10. Find m \angle L Q P.
compact_text: In rhombus LMPQ, m \angle QLM = 2x^{2}-10, m \angle QPM = 8x, and MP = 10. Find m \angle LQP.
annotat_text:
In rhombus LMPQ, $m \angle Q L M=2 x^{2}-10$, $m \angle Q P M=8 x$,  and $M P=10$ . 
Find $m\angle LQP$
